alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Grant, northwestern Jefferson, southeastern Saline, southeastern Hot Spring and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1029 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Haskell to near Tull to near Thiel. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Sheridan... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Redfield... Traskwood... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Cane Creek... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Ironton... East End... Orion... Hensley Island... Dogwood... Pine Bluff Arsenal... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Pulaski; Saline
